mainType.desc1: *************** THIS IS REQUIRED AND MUST BE CHANGED ***************
mainType.desc2: Fully qualified class name of the root node of the link.

connectionType.desc: Can be specified to override the default connection type.

isRequester.desc: Whether or not the link is a requester.

isResponder.desc: Whether or not the link is a responder.

readTimeout.desc: Millis timeout for reading from the connection.

saveInterval.desc: How often to backup the node database in minutes.

stableDelay.desc: Millis after the node tree is started before calling stable.

transportFactory.desc: Can be specified to override the default standalone transport.

reconnectDelayMultiplier.desc: Factor by which to multiply the reconnect delay every time bacnet fails to connect to a connection or device.
